data.title: MBA in Financial Engineering
data.subtitle: Build Your Future in Core Global Finance.
data.description: Investment Banking | Hedge Funds | Equity Research | Risk & Quant Roles

data.subtitleInput: A quick look at the program's value, ROI, and accreditation.
data.highlight-descriptionTextarea: Available for CAT 99+ percentilers. Other CAT takers can apply for Scholarship Test.
data.highlight-disclaimerTextarea: * Career trajectory projections are based on current placement data, alumni performance reviews, and projected industry trends for the financial engineering sector in India (2024–2027). Actual results may vary based on individual performance and market conditions.

items.quoteTextarea: From financial modelling to IPO strategies, this MBA has shaped my future in global finance.
FFOI's faculty combines deep industry knowledge with practical insights, making learning impactful and relevant.
The practical learning approach and industry connections have made all the difference in my career.
FFOI's comprehensive curriculum has given me a competitive edge in the world of investment banking.
FFOI's MBA program has provided me with the skills and confidence to excel in investment banking.
The live market simulations have been invaluable for real-world finance applications.
The MBA in Investment Banking has opened doors to a global career in finance.
The hands-on training and industry exposure have made me job-ready for top financial firms.

data.subtitleTextarea: Financial Engineering is no longer optional — it is the infrastructure of global finance.

items.descriptionTextarea: Quantitative and engineered strategies dominate hedge funds and institutional investing globally, reshaping asset management.
Financial engineering skills power modern trading, pricing, and risk systems. The majority of market volume is now code-driven.
Top finance roles pay 2–3× traditional MBA roles. Global IB, quant, and risk roles consistently outperform average salaries.
Financial engineering underpins pricing, hedging, and risk control of these massive markets, exceeding global GDP.
Growing faster than conventional finance and general management roles. Demand for tech-savvy finance professionals is surging.
Over 80% of top banks use quantitative risk models. Valuation and capital adequacy depend on these frameworks.

data.subtitleTextarea: This program is suited for candidates who:

criteria.textTextarea: 10+2+3 / 10+2+4 graduates from Commerce, Finance, Management, Science or Engineering backgrounds with minimum 50% marks. Final year students may apply.
Aspirants aiming for core finance careers in investment, markets, and risk who prefer data-backed decision making over theory-heavy learning.
No prior coding or advanced mathematics background is mandatory. The curriculum builds competency progressively.

data.titleInput: Industry Potential for MBA in Financial Engineering
data.subtitleTextarea: Financial Engineering sits at the core of how global capital is structured, traded, protected, and scaled.

items.descriptionTextarea: Across equities and fixed income—engineered, traded, and risk-managed by investment banks, hedge funds, and global institutions.
Annual revenues driven by M&A, capital markets, structured finance, and complex deal advisory.
Projected to reach USD 8–9 trillion by 2030, powered by quantitative strategies and advanced financial models.
Where pricing, structuring, and risk management demand deep financial engineering expertise.
Annual global spend with 8–12% CAGR growth in core finance and quantitative roles.

data.conclusionTextarea: Financial Engineering sits at the core of how global capital is structured, traded, protected, and scaled—making it one of the most powerful MBA specialisations for careers in Investment Banking, Hedge Funds, Risk, and Global Markets.

data.titleInput: Illustrative Career Paths that Define Success
data.subtitleInput: Step into the high-stakes world of finance and carve your path to success!

responsibilities: Works on high-value transactions and valuations
Builds and analyses financial models for deals
Works with portfolio companies to maximize returns
Develops fraud prevention and risk management frameworks
Advises on mergers, acquisitions, and corporate buyouts
Conducts market research to identify opportunities
Develops financial plans for corporate expansion
Analyzes business performance to drive profitability
Manages capital allocation and investment portfolios
Ensures smooth processing of investment transactions
Collaborates with compliance and regulatory teams

data.subtitleTextarea: The program follows a structured framework ensuring conceptual depth, applied learning, and role readiness.

pillars.descriptionTextarea: A future-ready pedagogy shaping leaders in Financial Engineering.
Where theory meets real-world finance and market excellence.
Building analytical minds for global financial markets.
Designed to master derivatives, risk, and strategic finance.

data.subtitleTextarea: A streamlined, transparent process designed to identify and nurture future finance leaders.

steps.descriptionTextarea: Complete the comprehensive application form with your academic records and professional background.
Our expert admissions committee meticulously reviews your profile to ensure eligibility and program fit.

steps.description: Selected candidates are invited for a personal interview to assess aptitude, career goals, and potential.

steps.descriptionTextarea: Successful candidates receive a formal admission offer to secure their seat in the upcoming cohort.

data.descriptionTextarea: Candidates scoring 99+ percentile and above in CAT are eligible for a 100% tuition fee waiver, subject to:
conditions: Other CAT takers can apply for Scholarship Test

content: Since its inception in 2000, the Finance Forum of India (FFOI) has been at the forefront of promoting financial literacy and nurturing Financial Acumen Skills (FAS), with a strong commitment to bridging the gap between economics and business.
Over the years, FFOI has empowered more than 25,000 individuals through partnerships with 1,000+ institutions, leaving a significant mark on India’s financial education landscape.

For those aiming to thrive in Financial Engineering, FFOI’s MBA program offers a dynamic platform to acquire cutting-edge knowledge and expertise. Join us and become part of a legacy that shapes the next generation of leaders with exceptional FAS.

data.subtitleInput: Get answers to common questions about our program

items.questionInput: How is MBA in Financial Engineering different from a regular MBA Finance?
items.answerTextarea: Focuses on quantitative finance, risk, derivatives, and global markets; more technical and core finance-oriented than regular MBA Finance.

items.questionInput: Do I need prior coding or advanced mathematics knowledge?
items.answerTextarea: No. Skills are built progressively from fundamentals.

items.questionInput: What kind of careers can I pursue after this program?
items.answerTextarea: Roles include Investment Banking Analyst, Private Equity Associate, Risk Officer, M&A Consultant, Corporate Finance Strategist, and Operations Specialist.

items.questionInput: What is the placement potential and ROI of this program?
items.answerTextarea: Starting salaries: ₹8–20 LPA | Top roles: ₹40–120 LPA+ | ROI horizon: ~15 months.
Yes. 100% tuition fee waiver for CAT 99 percentile candidates, subject to verification and limited seats.

items.questionInput: Who is eligible to apply for this program?
items.answerTextarea: Graduates (10+2+3 / 10+2+4) from Commerce, Finance, Management, Science, or Engineering with 50%+ marks. Final-year students may apply.
Placements are not guaranteed; outcomes depend on individual performance and market conditions.

items.questionInput: What industries and companies can I work with after graduation?
items.answerTextarea: Global Investment Banks, Hedge Funds, Private Equity, Asset Management, Consulting, and FinTech.

items.questionInput: Is the program practical or only theory-based?
items.answerTextarea: It is a blend of theory and applied learning using real-world projects and the FFOI Financial Engineering Mandala.

items.questionInput: How long is the program and is it UGC-approved?

data.titleInput: If you are serious about a career in core global finance, this program is built for you.
data.footerTextInput: Join 1000+ professionals who’ve transformed their careers with FFOI
